nested_items.name: SamplingRuleRecords
nested_items.description: Rule definitions and metadata.

nested_items.name: SamplingRule
nested_items.description: The sampling rule.

nested_items.name: RuleName
nested_items.description: The name of the sampling rule. Specify a rule by either name or ARN, but not both.

nested_items.name: RuleARN
nested_items.description: The ARN of the sampling rule. Specify a rule by either name or ARN, but not both.

nested_items.name: ResourceARN
nested_items.description: Matches the ARN of the Amazon Web Services resource on which the service runs.

nested_items.name: Priority
nested_items.description: The priority of the sampling rule.

nested_items.name: FixedRate
nested_items.description: The percentage of matching requests to instrument, after the reservoir is exhausted.

nested_items.name: ReservoirSize
nested_items.description: A fixed number of matching requests to instrument per second, prior to applying the fixed rate. The reservoir is not used directly by services, but applies to all services using the rule collectively.

nested_items.name: ServiceName
nested_items.description: Matches the name that the service uses to identify itself in segments.

nested_items.name: ServiceType
nested_items.description: Matches the origin that the service uses to identify its type in segments.

nested_items.name: Host
nested_items.description: Matches the hostname from a request URL.

nested_items.name: HTTPMethod
nested_items.description: Matches the HTTP method of a request.

nested_items.name: URLPath
nested_items.description: Matches the path from a request URL.

nested_items.name: Version
nested_items.description: The version of the sampling rule format ( 1).

nested_items.name: Attributes
nested_items.description: Matches attributes derived from the request.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: When the rule was created.

nested_items.name: ModifiedAt
nested_items.description: When the rule was last modified.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: Pagination token.
